alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 7:02PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PLUMAS...SIERRA...SOUTHEASTERN LASSEN...NEVADA...STOREY AND SOUTHERN WASHOE COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM PDT... At 702 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lemmon Valley, or 7 miles north of Reno, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph with frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reno, Sparks, Lockwood, Wingfield Springs, Northwest Reno, Spanish Springs, Cold Springs, Cold Springs Valley, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Mogul, Golden Valley, Verdi-Mogul, Caughlin Ranch, Hidden Valley, Dog Valley, Somersett, Stead, Verdi, Lemmon Valley, and Reno-Tahoe International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
